00029 #ifndef SC_SIGNAL_IFS_H
00030 #define SC_SIGNAL_IFS_H
00031 
00032 
00033 #include "sysc/communication/sc_interface.h"
00034 #include "sysc/communication/sc_writer_policy.h"

00037 namespace sc_dt
00038 {
00039     class SC_API sc_logic;

00048 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 //  CLASS : sc_signal_in_if<T>
00050 //
00051 //  The sc_signal<T> input interface class.
00052 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 
00054 template <class T>
00055 class sc_signal_in_if
00056 : virtual public sc_interface
00057 {
00058 public:
00059 
00060     // get the value changed event
00061     virtual const sc_event& value_changed_event() const = 0;
00062 
00063 
00064     // read the current value
00065     virtual const T& read() const = 0;
00066 
00067     // get a reference to the current value (for tracing)
00068     virtual const T& get_data_ref() const = 0;
00069 
00070 
00071     // was there a value changed event?
00072     virtual bool event() const = 0;
00073 
00074 protected:
00075 
00076     // constructor
00077 
00078     sc_signal_in_if()
00079         {}
00080 
00081 private:
00082 
00083     // disabled
00084     sc_signal_in_if( const sc_signal_in_if<T>& );
00085     sc_signal_in_if<T>& operator = ( const sc_signal_in_if<T>& );
00086 };
00087 
00088 
00089 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 //  CLASS : sc_signal_in_if<bool>
00091 //
00092 //  Specialization of sc_signal_in_if<T> for type bool.
00093 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 
00095 class SC_API sc_reset;
00096 
00097 template <>
00098 class sc_signal_in_if<bool>
00099 : virtual public sc_interface
00100 {
00101     friend class sc_reset;
00102 public:
00103 
00104     // get the value changed event
00105     virtual const sc_event& value_changed_event() const = 0;
00106 
00107     // get the positive edge event
00108     virtual const sc_event& posedge_event() const = 0;
00109 
00110     // get the negative edge event
00111     virtual const sc_event& negedge_event() const = 0;
00112 
00113 
00114     // read the current value
00115     virtual const bool& read() const = 0;
00116 
00117     // get a reference to the current value (for tracing)
00118     virtual const bool& get_data_ref() const = 0;
00119 
00120 
00121     // was there a value changed event?
00122     virtual bool event() const = 0;
00123 
00124     // was there a positive edge event?
00125     virtual bool posedge() const = 0;
00126 
00127     // was there a negative edge event?
00128     virtual bool negedge() const = 0;
00129 
00130 protected:
00131 
00132     // constructor
00133 
00134     sc_signal_in_if()
00135         {}
00136 
00137 private:
00138 
00139     // disabled
00140     sc_signal_in_if( const sc_signal_in_if<bool>& );
00141     sc_signal_in_if<bool>& operator = ( const sc_signal_in_if<bool>& );
00142 
00143     // designate this object as a reset signal
00144     virtual sc_reset* is_reset() const
00145       { return NULL; }
00146 };
00147 
00148 
00149 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 //  CLASS : sc_signal_in_if<sc_dt::sc_logic>
00151 //
00152 //  Specialization of sc_signal_in_if<T> for type sc_dt::sc_logic.
00153 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 
00155 template <>
00156 class SC_API sc_signal_in_if<sc_dt::sc_logic>
00157 : virtual public sc_interface
00158 {
00159 public:
00160 
00161     // get the value changed event
00162     virtual const sc_event& value_changed_event() const = 0;
00163 
00164     // get the positive edge event
00165     virtual const sc_event& posedge_event() const = 0;
00166 
00167     // get the negative edge event
00168     virtual const sc_event& negedge_event() const = 0;
00169 
00170 
00171     // read the current value
00172     virtual const sc_dt::sc_logic& read() const = 0;
00173 
00174     // get a reference to the current value (for tracing)
00175     virtual const sc_dt::sc_logic& get_data_ref() const = 0;
00176 
00177 
00178     // was there a value changed event?
00179     virtual bool event() const = 0;
00180 
00181     // was there a positive edge event?
00182     virtual bool posedge() const = 0;
00183 
00184     // was there a negative edge event?
00185     virtual bool negedge() const = 0;
00186 
00187 
00188 protected:
00189 
00190     // constructor
00191 
00192     sc_signal_in_if()
00193         {}
00194 
00195 private:
00196 
00197     // disabled
00198     sc_signal_in_if( const sc_signal_in_if<sc_dt::sc_logic>& );
00199     sc_signal_in_if<sc_dt::sc_logic>& operator = (
00200         const sc_signal_in_if<sc_dt::sc_logic>& );
00201 };
00202 
00203 
00204 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00205 //  CLASS : sc_signal_write_if<T>
00206 //
00207 //  The standard output interface class.
00208 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00209 template< typename T >
00210 class sc_signal_write_if : public virtual sc_interface
00211 {
00212 public:
00213     sc_signal_write_if() {}
00214     // write the new value
00215     virtual void write( const T& ) = 0;
00216     virtual sc_writer_policy get_writer_policy() const
00217         { return SC_DEFAULT_WRITER_POLICY; }
00218 private:
00219     // disabled
00220     sc_signal_write_if( const sc_signal_write_if<T>& );
00221     sc_signal_write_if<T>& operator = ( const sc_signal_write_if<T>& );
00222 };
00223 
00224 
00225 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00226 //  CLASS : sc_signal_inout_if<T>
00227 //
00228 //  The sc_signal<T> input/output interface class.
00229 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00230 
00231 template <class T>
00232 class sc_signal_inout_if
00233 : public sc_signal_in_if<T>, public sc_signal_write_if<T>
00234 {
00235 
00236 protected:
00237 
00238     // constructor
00239 
00240     sc_signal_inout_if()
00241         {}
00242 
00243 private:
00244 
00245     // disabled
00246     sc_signal_inout_if( const sc_signal_inout_if<T>& );
00247     sc_signal_inout_if<T>& operator = ( const sc_signal_inout_if<T>& );
00248 };
00249 
00250 
00251 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00252 //  CLASS : sc_signal_out_if<T>
00253 //
00254 //  The sc_signal<T> output interface class.
00255 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00256 
00257 // sc_signal_out_if can also be read from, hence no difference with
00258 // sc_signal_inout_if.
00259 
00260 #define sc_signal_out_if sc_signal_inout_if
00261 
00262 } // namespace sc_core
